name: Plank
execution: Start in a push-up position with your elbows bent 90 degrees and your weight resting on your forearms
Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels, engaging your core muscles
Hold this position for the desired amount of time, keeping your core tight and avoiding sagging or arching

name: Russian Twists
execution: Sit on the floor with your knees bent and your feet elevated off the ground, leaning back slightly
Hold a weight plate or medicine ball with both hands at chest level
Exhale and rotate your torso to the right, bringing the weight towards the floor outside your right hip
Inhale and return to the starting position, then repeat on the left side

name: Leg Raises
execution: Hang from a pull-up bar or support yourself on dip bars with your arms straight
Exhale and raise your legs until they are parallel to the ground or higher
Inhale and lower your legs back to the starting position, keeping control

name: Crunches
execution: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your feet flat on the floor
Place your hands behind your head or across your chest
Exhale and lift your upper body off the floor, bringing your ribcage towards your pelvis
Inhale and lower your upper body back to the starting position, keeping control

name: Bicycle Crunches
execution: Lie on your back with your knees bent and your hands behind your head
Exhale and lift your shoulder blades off the floor, bringing your right elbow towards your left knee while straightening your right leg
Inhale and return to the starting position, then repeat on the other side
Continue alternating sides in a pedaling motion

name: Dead Bug
execution: Lie on your back with your arms extended towards the ceiling and your legs bent at a 90-degree angle
Exhale and extend your right leg towards the floor while simultaneously lowering your left arm overhead
Inhale and return to the starting position, then repeat with the opposite arm and leg
Continue alternating sides while keeping your lower back pressed into the floor

name: Plank with Shoulder Taps
execution: Start in a plank position with your elbows bent 90 degrees and your weight resting on your forearms
Exhale and tap your right shoulder with your left hand, then return to the starting position
Inhale and tap your left shoulder with your right hand, then return to the starting position
Continue alternating shoulder taps while keeping your core stable and avoiding rotation

name: Flutter Kicks
execution: Lie on your back with your legs extended and your hands under your glutes for support
Exhale and lift your legs a few inches off the ground
Alternately kick your legs up and down in a small, fluttering motion
Keep your core engaged and your lower back pressed into the floor throughout the movement

name: Mountain Climbers
execution: Start in a plank position with your hands directly under your shoulders and your body in a straight line from head to heels
Exhale and drive one knee towards your chest, then quickly switch legs
Continue alternating legs in a running motion while keeping your core engaged and your hips level
Maintain a steady pace throughout the exercise

name: Side Plank
execution: Lie on your side with your legs extended and your elbow directly beneath your shoulder
Exhale and lift your hips off the ground, creating a straight line from head to heels
Engage your core muscles and hold this position for the desired amount of time
Repeat on the other side

name: Hanging Leg Raises
execution: Hang from a pull-up bar with your arms straight and your legs together
Exhale and raise your legs until they are parallel to the ground or higher
Inhale and lower your legs back to the starting position, keeping control
